hasDitaContent.@value: Both osimertinib and amifampridine prolong the QT interval. Most manufacturers advise avoiding the use of two or more drugs that are associated with QT prolongation. Increasing age, female sex, cardiac disease, and some metabolic disturbances (notably hypokalaemia) predispose to QT prolongation.

hasDitaContent.@value: Osimertinib is predicted to increase the exposure to topotecan. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Osimertinib   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   topotecan .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Torasemide is predicted to cause hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with osimertinib. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Torasemide   is predicted to   cause   hypokalaemia (potentially increasing the risk of torsade de pointes) when given with   osimertinib .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .
